name: Registrar and assistants; appointment, tenure, powers, and duties
text: §501-6  Registrar and assistants; appointment, tenure, powers, and duties.  The judge of the court shall appoint a registrar and such assistants as may be allowed by law.  The registrar or an assistant shall attend the sessions of the court and keep a docket of all causes, and shall affix the seal of the court to all processes or papers proceeding therefrom, and requiring a seal. [L 1903, c 56, §7; am L 1909, c 11, §3; am L 1913, c 21, §1; RL 1925, §3196; am L 1927, c 258, §1; RL 1935, §5005; RL 1945, §12605; RL 1955, §342-6; HRS §501-6; am L 2006, c 38, §10]
